page.title: 01The Scaleby Moss Area
page.content:
The Scaleby Moss Area
This block is a quiet,rural area with few dwellings.However,it is close to two main roads.To the North is the road from Brampton to Longtown.To the West is the road from Carlisle to Longtown.These roads have houses and some amenities at intervals. Across the Southeast corner of the block runs the road from Carlisle to Scaleby.Along it,at intervals,are the main groups of farmhouses and farm buildings.One of the farms now has a caravan site for tourists and a small recreation hall for local use. The only other collection of dwellings in this block is the village of Scalebyhill.(See page 4).
